name: Maniac Mansion Deluxe
description: to hear all Music, you need proper MIDI support(eg: timidity++)
content:
files:
- arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/LucasFan Games/MMD/winsetup.exe
  game: http://www.adventurecorner.de/dl/mmd14setup.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    key: winemenubuilder.exe
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: ''
- task:
    app: sound=alsa
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: false
- task:
    app: vd=640x480
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: false
- task:
    description: Installing MMD
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: sandbox
    description: Disabling unused WINE features
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
